install.name: System - AntiCopy
install.author: Galaa
install.license: This extension in released under the GNU/GPL License - http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html
install.description: Restricts copying site contents by disabling the right click, highlight and copy functions using javascript. Copyright (C) 2011 Galaa (http://galaa.mn/)

param.name: disallow_r_click
param.label: Right Click
param.description: Allow or Disallow the right click

param.name: disallow_copy
param.label: Select and Copy
param.description: Disallow or Allow select and copy

param.name: show_message
param.label: Show Message
param.description: Show or Do not show popup message when right click or copy

param.name: message
param.label: Message
param.description: Popup message when right click or copy

param.default: Disable the restriction by User Group
